content: Net income for the fourth quarter totaled 188,000 or $0.02 per diluted share compared to 47,000 or breakeven per diluted share in the third quarter and 232,000 or $0.02 per diluted share in the fourth quarter of 2021. Net cash provided by operating activities was 938,000 in the fourth quarter compared to $1.6 million in the fourth quarter of last year. In conclusion, I am very pleased we were able to close out the year by increasing revenue sequentially compared to the third quarter, as well as generating positive operating income, net income and cash flow from operations for the quarter.
